suite.name: Heroku

test.name: Exit Intent

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Attribute Value Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` contains expected attribute value.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Continue On Failure
kw.doc: Runs the keyword and continues execution even if a failure occurs.

kw.name: Element Attribute Value Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` contains expected attribute value.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

test.doc: This test verifies the exit intent

suite.doc: This is a test suite for the Herokuapp
